channel.title: artifacts on Chef Habitat Builder on-prem documentation
channel.description: Recent content in artifacts on Chef Habitat Builder on-prem documentation

item.title: Minio Migrations
item.description: Migrating Package Artifacts to Minio This section is for installations of On-Premise Depot that were done prior to June 15, 2018. If you re-install or upgrade to a newer version of the On-Premise Depot, you will be required to also migrate your package artifacts to a local instance of Minio (the new object store we are using). Please follow the steps below. Pre-requisites Install the following Habitat packages:

item.title: Postgres Migration
item.description: Postgres Migration Merging Database Shards This section is for installations of On-Premise Depot that were done prior to August 17th 2018. If you re-install or upgrade to a newer version of the On-Premise Depot, you will be required to also merge your database shards into the public Postgres database schema. Please follow the steps below. Shard Migration Pre-requisites The password to your Postgres database. By default, this is located at /hab/svc/builder-datastore/config/pwfile A fresh backup of the two databases present in the On-Premise Depot, builder_sessionsrv and builder_originsrv.
